languages.text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цель атаки Кикеросс выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получает эффект, выбранный случайным образом: {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Цель атаки Кикеросс выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получает эффект, выбранный случайным образом: {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 绮克萝丝攻击目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会随机陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 绮克萝丝攻击目标时，目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定。若目标未能通过检定，则会随机陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一轮。

绮克萝丝攻击目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会随机陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: キーケロスの攻撃のターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH/g}g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失格した場合、この攻撃は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、ランダムに{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、又は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}の効果を与える。
languages.original_text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: キーケロスの攻撃のターゲットが耐久力抵抗テストに失格した場合、この攻撃は1ラウンドの間、ランダムに{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、又は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}の効果を与える。

キーケロスの攻撃のターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失格した場合、この攻撃は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、ランダムに{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、又は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}の効果を与える。

languages.text: Si el objetivo de uno de los ataque de Keykeross falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, el ataque inflige aleatoriamente {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el objetivo de uno de los ataque de Keykeross falla una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia, el ataque inflige aleatoriamente {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: Wenn das Ziel eines Angriffs von Keykeross eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} nicht besteht, verursacht dieser Angriff 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang zufällig {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn das Ziel eines Angriffs von Keykeross eine Zähigkeits-Widerstandsprobe nicht besteht, verursacht dieser Angriff 1 Runde lang zufällig {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}.

languages.text: Si la cible d'une attaque portée par Keykeross échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, cette attaque lui inflige au hasard l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si la cible d'une attaque portée par Keykeross échoue à un test lié à la Résistance, cette attaque lui inflige au hasard l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 round.

languages.text: Keykeross'un yaptığı bir saldırının hedefi; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse rastgele {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşme{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallama{/g} etkilerinden birine maruz kalır. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: If the target of an attack made by Keykeross fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
